properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wonderful story of love
Tell it to me again
Wonderful story of love
Wake the immortal strain!
Angels with raptures announce it
Shepherds with wonders believe it
Sinner, won't you believe it
Wonderful story of love

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Wonderful! Wonderful!
Wonderful!
Wonderful story of love

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Wonderful story of love
Tho' you are far away
Wonderful story of love
Still he doth call today
Calling from calvary's mountain
Down from the crystal bright fountain
Ever from the dawn of creation
Wonderful story of love

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Wonderful story of love
Jesus provides the rest
Wonderful story of love
For all the pure and the blest
Rest in those mansions above us
With those who have gone on before us
Singing the raptures chorus
Wonderful story of love
